urls.description: Have a question or request about your flight? Or would you like to give us some feedback? Simply choose your request or enquiry from the list below. Email us at askus@aerlingus.com. One of our agents will respond to you as soon as possible. If your query or request is urgen t, we suggest using our chat facility or calling us
